solution_line_template: The total number of petals Mabel has in her garden is {total_daisies} x {petals_per_daisy} = <<{total_daisies}*{petals_per_daisy}={total_petals}>>{total_petals} petals.
The total number of petals that Mabel gives to her teacher is {daisies_given} x {petals_per_daisy} = <<{daisies_given}*{petals_per_daisy}={petals_given}>>{petals_given} petals.
The total number of petals remaining in her garden is {total_petals} - {petals_given} = <<{total_petals}-{petals_given}={petals_remaining}>>{petals_remaining} petals.
